channel.title: [317]Major Problem[317]
channel.description: I have had a 508 server before witha couple people logged on to help me test it...it worked flawlessly.. Now as of today. I downloaded a nice lil 317 source and a client edited both..(giving credits of course) And I have all my router and java settings setup perfectly. Now heres the problem: As i have the server on. I open the client. I can connect using 127.0.0.1 or even 0.0.0.0 But when i use ,my ip for no-ip.com ,which is kizzyypkz.no-ip.info It doesnt let me connect what so ever. Please help me. I would really appreciate it :D

item.title: [317]Major Problem[317]
item.dc:creator: @RID22 RID22
item.description:
@RID22 wrote:

Either way works :] Topic should be closed now.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Major Problem[317]
item.dc:creator: @pkakidjr1 pkakidjr1
item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

Ok…
once your portfowarded (since you already are)
go to www.cmyip.com
then get your ip, change the 127.0.0.1 to that IP
and save then compile, then test it since thats what I did

Hope this hepled

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Major Problem[317]
item.dc:creator: @RID22 RID22
item.description:
@RID22 wrote:

You HAVE to use 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 if you dont its like connecting to a connection that already exists so it rejects it.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Major Problem[317]
item.dc:creator: @Kizzyypkz Kizzyypkz
item.description:
@Kizzyypkz wrote:

I just checked.
Its not blocking antyhing.
This doesnt make any sense
If i could use the 508 server perfectly/ Why cant i use 317’s perfectly?

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Major Problem[317]
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Kizzyypkz, post:1, topic:281261”]I have had a 508 server before witha couple people logged on to help me test it…it worked flawlessly…
Now as of today. I downloaded a nice lil 317 source and a client edited both…(giving credits of course)
And I have all my router and java settings setup perfectly.
Now heres the problem:
As i have the server on. I open the client.
I can connect using 127.0.0.1 or even 0.0.0.0
But when i use ,my ip for no-ip.com ,which is kizzyypkz.no-ip.info
It doesnt let me connect what so ever.
Please help me.
I would really appreciate it :D[/quote]

Make sure you don’t have anything blocking remote connections to your router.

Read full topic
